Ursus is a jekyll theme that is barebones from the start. It's meant to be heavily modified as needed, but structured in a way that can be built on.

Ursus Core Jekyll Theme
  • Home
  • About

A barebones (get it?) bootstrap jekyll theme

Ursus is a simple to use unchanged bootstrap jekyll theme. The goal is to give a starting point to build new projects from.

Learn More

Card loop section

This section loops the Card UI element. The Card element is held in the components folder. It's then passing the below data into the loop from section.variables into the include.variables
